name: PLATFORMER: BOSSFIGHT
description:
PLEASE PRESS F11 FOR GAME TO WORK CORRECTLY

PLATFORMER: BOSSFIGHT The second edition in the platformer series 

STORY

The Bosses one of the most dangerous creatures  on Earth they attacked villages destroyed cities and killed people but you, you will give them a taste of their own medicine for they killed your square father

CONTROLS

SPACE - Toggle Music

WAD - Forward Left Right

Arrow keys - Forward Left Right

HOW TO PLAY

YOU spawn as a dark blue square on the left

YOUR GOAL is to stay in light blue square long enough to damage the boss

TRY to survive and GOOD LUCK

CREDITS

Developed by Septic01

Track: Last Heroes - Dimensions [NCS Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.
Watch: https://youtu.be/ZPuvoDZj2hM
Free Download / Stream: http://ncs.io/DimensionsYO
